mapper.select: SELECT f.*, c.name as category_name, u.real_name as user_name FROM found_item f LEFT JOIN category c ON f.category_id = c.id LEFT JOIN user u ON f.user_id = u.id WHERE f.id = #{id}
SELECT f.*, c.name as category_name FROM found_item f LEFT JOIN category c ON f.category_id = c.id WHERE f.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY f.created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO found_item (user_id, category_id, title, description, found_time, found_location, contact_name, contact_phone, status, views) VALUES (#{userId}, #{categoryId}, #{title}, #{description}, #{foundTime}, #{foundLocation}, #{contactName}, #{contactPhone}, #{status}, #{views})
mapper.update: UPDATE found_item SET category_id = #{categoryId}, title = #{title}, description = #{description}, found_time = #{foundTime}, found_location = #{foundLocation}, contact_name = #{contactName}, contact_phone = #{contactPhone} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE found_item SET status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE found_item SET views = views + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
